name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that EVENT COUNT works properly

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When set Event Count {1} on Event Discovery Widget page
Then the number of events equals or less than Event Count {1}
Check that number of events equals or less than value: 1
Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When set Event Count {100} on Event Discovery Widget page
Then the number of events equals or less than Event Count {100}
Check that number of events equals or less than value: 100

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites

title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that EVENT COUNT works properly
